action.action-desc: Mr. Bridenstine introduced the following joint resolution; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States granting Congress the authority to enact laws limiting the number of terms that Representatives and Senators may serve.

section.text: That the following article is proposed as an amendment to the Constitution of the United States, which shall be valid to all intents and purposes as part of the Constitution when ratified by the legislatures of three-fourths of the several States within seven years after the date of its submission for ratification:
Congress may by law limit the number of terms that Representatives and Senators may serve.
